ygData.subject: Re: Ok, the magician summoned underwater breathing is here, /feedback time
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the summoned water stone has one (1) charge of enduring breath, and the stone is lore, so I still think (hope) there is a market out there for us. I was
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the summoned water stone has one (1) charge of enduring breath,
and the stone is lore, so I still think (hope) there is a market out there
for
us. I was about the only happy magician on Bristlebane last night, I think
;)

Miffe Treetall

PS: How about this for luck. Made 4 aqua lung attempts last night, 3
succeeded and skill raised from 102 to 104!

----- Original Message -----
From: Linus Gustafsson <linusgson@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 10:33 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Ok, the magician summoned underwater breathing is
here, /feedback time


> From: "Linus Gustafsson" <linusgson@...>
>
> Well, this kinda sucks, after spending a good 8kpp to get my skill to 104,
> and after getting some sponsors to keep tinkering up so that one day I can
> make good money for both me and my sponsors, they instate the magician no
> cost summoned items.
>
> I DO think that there will still be a market for the rebreathers,
unlimited
> i-never-have-to-worry-about-underwaterbreathing-with-this items will
always
> have a market, its just the aqualung market that died.
>
> I still have LOTS of orders for rebreathers for when i can make em,
although
> a price of 2kp is, I think, the highest price tolerable to most parts of
the
> market. Which of course, with the failure rate to make these items, will
> make me loose money.
>
> As to tinkered pets, i dont think they can be made. I heard rumors on
> diamond dust beeing found in Kaladim, but I checked every merchant i could
> find, no luck.
>
> Also, i would like to know if anyone was albe to find the coral mesh from
> sharks in oot still. I mean, this guy that didnt want to share his info
> would of course say they dont drop anymore to keep em for himself if he
> accidentaly dropped that info.. I'll check it out myself too.
>
> -Sandortien Stormwielder, 50th wiz of Xegony
>
>
